section.name: Overview
section.p: The project goal is to develop a graphical user interface for programming a PLD (Programable Logics Device). The software is written in C++ and based on QT. It is available for Linux and Windows.

The development team is 7 persons, all students of the University of Stuttgart, Germany. The project is part of our studies in Software Engineering. The output of the project is going to be used in conjunction with a hardware system called Offener Antrieb also developed at the University.
The project ran from Mai 2003 to Mai 2004. All documentation and software products that were created in the course of the project are available from this page.

section.name: Ueberblick
section.p: Entwicklung einer Programmierumgebung fuer einen PLD-basierten Offenen Antrieb. Weiter zu einer Beschreibung des Projekts. Eine Installationshilfe und Beschreibung der Benutzeroberfl√§che befinden sich im Handbuch.
